Name: The Tiny Tale 2
About the game: The Elven kingdom is in great danger! Thanks to the greed of Elven Queen Ginevra the Elven life-giving shrine was corrupted by the Evil Necromancer. The Troll and his fellow Gremlins must find the remaining holy shrines scattered around the kingdom to heal the cursed one and banish the Necromancer. Head on to mysterious journey with your creatures and save the Elven kingdom! 'This is just as whimsical as the first installment of this game' - SilverBranch (BFG) 'Adorable and challenging' - rosekaufmann (BFG) Key Features: Over 40 challenging levels Customize and outfit your little helpers English voiceover with funny dialogs Steam achievements , leaderboards and trading cards Challenging time-management gameplay
